interfaces

Interface Agent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Agent_simple

    public interface Agent
    An Agent is the component of the multi agent system that has a non shared vocabulary, based on a specific ContrastSet. It tries to discuss with an other Agent in order to create a new ContrastSet that allows mutual intelligibility.
    Author:
    kemoadrian

      • learn

        ContrastSet learn(java.util.List<csic.iiia.ftl.base.core.FeatureTerm> data_set)
        Use a data set to create the initial ContrastSet of the Agent.
        Parameters:
        data_set - the List of FeatureTerm used for the learning.
        Returns:
        a new ContrastSet that partitions that data set.
